Text.text: This accessibility statement applies to the website of p78 Quick Apply.

Title.text: Status of compliance with the requirements

Text.text: The verification of compliance with the requirements is based on an external review carried out in April 2025 in accordance with WCAG 2.2.
This website is currently being optimized, especially with regard to accessibility.
Based on the review, the site is partially compliant with the aforementioned changes in the following points:
• Not all images and linked graphics have text alternatives according to WCAG Success Criterion 1.1.1.
• In some cases, the hierarchy of headings does not meet the requirements of WCAG Success Criterion 1.3.1.
• The site does not currently allow users to skip individual blocks or areas, as required by WCAG Success Criterion 2.4.1.
• Error messages in forms do not describe how to correct the error, as required by WCAG Success Criterion 3.3.3, because they are generic error messages.
This declaration was last updated on 02.04.2025.
